recipesJson.name: One Night
recipesJson.author: Philosaphucker
recipesJson.description: Moral of this story: don't be afraid to create recipes after enjoying some adult beverages. Ever imagine what would happen if FA Fuji and FA Black Currant made sweet love and reproduced? Now well you have. This is a beautiful love child, indeed. Strong in character, this is quite tart and tasty as a shake and vape and gets sweeter as it matures. After 4 days, it maintains a crisp (yet juicy) texture. Past that point, who knows? Let me know if it lasts that long. Replace INW Pineapple with 0.5% TFA Pineapple if you must.

reviews.text: I absolutely love this mix!! I had a bottle of FA blackcurrant sitting around doing nothing so I finally decided to give it a try using this recipe and boy was I glad I did!! It may sound like 2% fa blackcurrant is a lot but it works wonderfully here! Great balance with currant and the front letting you know of its existence, I will be mixing this again thanks philo!

Had this steeped for a month now, and its been very solid from shake and vape all the way till now. Still sweet and holds up the tartness. There is a complex intertwining of fuji and blackcurrant, with some pineapple top and base notes throughout. Solid fruity mix ðŸ‘Œ
Wanted a fruity vape with black currant, so tried this one.  Smooth & tasty.  I might drop down the fuji a bit next time, but this hit the profile I was looking for.

Perfectly balanced blending right here. I don't know how you managed to make this work. Everything I try with these two pineapples ends up tasting weird. This is just smooth and delightful, and never gets old. Great work!
I'll have to order INW Pineapple to vape the 1:1 recipe but the version I vaped (drunk AND sober the next day) with my HS Pineapple sub was very good. Mine certainly didn't last 4 days.
